messages.subject: responding to people who just don't GET IT !!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I just want to add that I think Sandra made a very valid point !!!!!! The point was if people were really interested they would research it but they
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
I just want to add that I think Sandra made a very valid point !!!!!!
The point was if people were really interested they would research
it but they are looking for a confrontation !!!!!
Boy ! That really nails it !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I have found that to be so true for me because I can hear it in
people voices as they question me !!!
Also someone else said "There was no friendly curiosity and desire
to really understand" I think that about sums up the majority of
people who question me LOL........
Can anyone tell I have PMS LOL...........
Sonya,
Attleboro, MASS

P.S. I look forward to meeting you this summer @ the Live and Learn
conference Sandra :)
